pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:0.5: 82. The training rule on every year
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.2: At that time the nuns gave full ordination every year, and the nuns’ dwelling place did not have sufficient capacity.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.4: “How can the nuns give full ordination every year? The nuns’ dwelling place doesn’t have sufficient capacity.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.7: “How can the nuns give full ordination every year?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.11: “… How can the nuns give full ordination every year?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:1.14: ‘If a nun gives full ordination in consecutive years, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.9: If, intending to give full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.10: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.11: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.12: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1.13: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.2: if she gives full ordination every other year;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.2.5: The twelfth training rule is finished.
